lines.i: The Family History Oranizer associates a set of observations with a family member. For example, the Family History Organizer can group a set of observations about the patient's father.

ol.li:
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId ( CONF:10497 ) such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.45"
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood) (CONF:8601)

SHALL contain at least one [1..*] component (CONF:8607, CONF:16888)
Contains exactly one [1..1] Family History Observation (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.46)

SHALL contain zero or one [0..1] subject (CONF:8609)
This subject SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] relatedSubject (CONF:15244)
This relatedSubject SHALL contain zero or one [0..1] @classCode="PRS" (CONF:15245)
This relatedSubject SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:15246), where the @code SHOULD be selected from ValueSet FamilyHistoryRelatedSubjectCode 2.16.840.1.113883.1.11.19579 STATIC 1 (CONF:15247)
This relatedSubject SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] subject (CONF:15248)
This subject SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] administrativeGenderCode (CONF:15974), where the @code SHALL be selected from ValueSet Administrative Gender (HL7 V3) 2.16.840.1.113883.1.11.1 DYNAMIC (CONF:15975)
This subject SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] birthTime (CONF:15976)
This subject MAY contain zero or one [0..1] sDTCDeceasedInd (CONF:15981)
The prefix sdtc: SHALL be bound to the namespace "urn:hl7-org:sdtc". The use of the namespace provides a necessary extension to CDA R2 for the use of the deceasedInd element.
This subject MAY contain zero or one [0..1] sDTCDeceasedTime (CONF:15982)
The prefix sdtc: SHALL be bound to the namespace "urn:hl7-org:sdtc". The use of the namespace provides a necessary extension to CDA R2 for the use of the deceasedTime element.
This subject SHOULD contain zero or more [0..*] sDTCId (CONF:15249)
The prefix sdtc: SHALL be bound to the namespace "urn:hl7-org:sdtc". The use of the namespace provides a necessary extension to CDA R2 for the use of the id element.
This subject age of a relative at the time of a family history observation SHOULD be inferred by comparing RelatedSubject/subject/birthTime with Observation/effectiveTime (CONF:15983)
This subject age of a relative at the time of death MAY be inferred by comparing RelatedSubject/subject/birthTime with RelatedSubject/subject/sdwg:deceasedTime (CONF:8632)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood) (CONF:8601)

SHALL contain at least one [1..*] component (CONF:8607, CONF:16888)
Contains exactly one [1..1] Family History Observation (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.46)

SHALL contain zero or one [0..1] subject (CONF:8609)
This subject SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] relatedSubject (CONF:15244)
This relatedSubject SHALL contain zero or one [0..1] @classCode="PRS" (CONF:15245)
This relatedSubject SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:15246), where the @code SHOULD be selected from ValueSet FamilyHistoryRelatedSubjectCode 2.16.840.1.113883.1.11.19579 STATIC 1 (CONF:15247)
This relatedSubject SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] subject (CONF:15248)
This subject SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] administrativeGenderCode (CONF:15974), where the @code SHALL be selected from ValueSet Administrative Gender (HL7 V3) 2.16.840.1.113883.1.11.1 DYNAMIC (CONF:15975)
This subject SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] birthTime (CONF:15976)
This subject MAY contain zero or one [0..1] sDTCDeceasedInd (CONF:15981)
The prefix sdtc: SHALL be bound to the namespace "urn:hl7-org:sdtc". The use of the namespace provides a necessary extension to CDA R2 for the use of the deceasedInd element.
This subject MAY contain zero or one [0..1] sDTCDeceasedTime (CONF:15982)
The prefix sdtc: SHALL be bound to the namespace "urn:hl7-org:sdtc". The use of the namespace provides a necessary extension to CDA R2 for the use of the deceasedTime element.
This subject SHOULD contain zero or more [0..*] sDTCId (CONF:15249)
The prefix sdtc: SHALL be bound to the namespace "urn:hl7-org:sdtc". The use of the namespace provides a necessary extension to CDA R2 for the use of the id element.
This subject age of a relative at the time of a family history observation SHOULD be inferred by comparing RelatedSubject/subject/birthTime with Observation/effectiveTime (CONF:15983)
This subject age of a relative at the time of death MAY be inferred by comparing RelatedSubject/subject/birthTime with RelatedSubject/subject/sdwg:deceasedTime (CONF:8632)

body.codeblock: <organizer xmlns="urn:hl7-org:v3"> <id root="MDHT" extension="1049900427"/> <statusCode code="completed"/> <effectiveTime> <low value="2013"/> <high value="2013"/> </effectiveTime> <subject> <relatedSubject classCode="PRS"> <code codeSystem="2.16.840.1.113883.5.111" codeSystemName="RoleCode"/> <subject> <administrativeGenderCode codeSystem="2.16.840.1.113883.5.1" codeSystemName="AdministrativeGenderCode"/> </subject> </relatedSubject> </subject> <component> <observation> <id root="MDHT" extension="1773218960"/> <code code="903327131"/> <effectiveTime> <low value="2013"/> <high value="2013"/> </effectiveTime> <entryRelationship> <observation> <id root="MDHT" extension="1601786227"/> <code code="337463159"/> <effectiveTime> <low value="2013"/> <high value="2013"/> </effectiveTime> </observation> </entryRelationship> <entryRelationship> <observation> <id root="MDHT" extension="2098572163"/> <code code="1419698961"/> <effectiveTime> <low value="2013"/> <high value="2013"/> </effectiveTime> </observation> </entryRelationship> </observation> </component> </organizer>
